location.desc: Used to fetch daily prayer times from the Aladhan API.

city.label: City
city.desc: Enter your city name in English.

country.label: Country
country.desc: Enter your country name or 2-letter code (e.g. UK, US, DZ).

method.label: Calculation Method
method.desc: Determines how prayer times are calculated. Choose the authority followed in your region.

showCountdown.label: Show countdown
showCountdown.desc: Show a live countdown to the next prayer in the bar instead of the static time.

notifications.desc: Show a notification when each prayer time begins.

azan.desc: Play azan audio when a prayer time begins.

playAzan.label: Play Azan
playAzan.desc: Play the azan when each prayer time begins.

calibration.desc: Adjust the displayed Hijri date if it does not match your local moon sighting.

hijriDayOffset.label: Hijri Day Adjustment
hijriDayOffset.desc: Shift the displayed Hijri day if the API date does not match your local moon sighting.

school.label: Asr Calculation School
school.desc: Shafi/Maliki/Hanbali uses shadow factor 1. Hanafi uses shadow factor 2, giving a later Asr time.

error.network: Network request failed. Check your internet connection.
